description: Camelot Wheel key compatibility mappings for harmonic mixing. Each key maps to its compatible keys for smooth DJ transitions.

1A.notes: Same key (1A), relative major (1B), adjacent keys for smooth transitions

1B.notes: Same key (1B), relative minor (1A), adjacent keys for smooth transitions

2A.notes: Same key (2A), relative major (2B), adjacent keys for smooth transitions

2B.notes: Same key (2B), relative minor (2A), adjacent keys for smooth transitions

3A.notes: Same key (3A), relative major (3B), adjacent keys for smooth transitions

3B.notes: Same key (3B), relative minor (3A), adjacent keys for smooth transitions

4A.notes: Same key (4A), relative major (4B), adjacent keys for smooth transitions

4B.notes: Same key (4B), relative minor (4A), adjacent keys for smooth transitions

5A.notes: Same key (5A), relative major (5B), adjacent keys for smooth transitions

5B.notes: Same key (5B), relative minor (5A), adjacent keys for smooth transitions

6A.notes: Same key (6A), relative major (6B), adjacent keys for smooth transitions

6B.notes: Same key (6B), relative minor (6A), adjacent keys for smooth transitions

7A.notes: Same key (7A), relative major (7B), adjacent keys for smooth transitions

7B.notes: Same key (7B), relative minor (7A), adjacent keys for smooth transitions

8A.notes: Same key (8A), relative major (8B), adjacent keys for smooth transitions

8B.notes: Same key (8B), relative minor (8A), adjacent keys for smooth transitions

9A.notes: Same key (9A), relative major (9B), adjacent keys for smooth transitions

9B.notes: Same key (9B), relative minor (9A), adjacent keys for smooth transitions

10A.notes: Same key (10A), relative major (10B), adjacent keys for smooth transitions

10B.notes: Same key (10B), relative minor (10A), adjacent keys for smooth transitions

11A.notes: Same key (11A), relative major (11B), adjacent keys for smooth transitions

11B.notes: Same key (11B), relative minor (11A), adjacent keys for smooth transitions

12A.notes: Same key (12A), relative major (12B), adjacent keys for smooth transitions

12B.notes: Same key (12B), relative minor (12A), adjacent keys for smooth transitions

perfect.description: Same key - perfect match, always works

relative.description: Relative major/minor - energy boost/drop, very compatible
relative.notes: A to B = energy boost, B to A = energy drop

adjacent.description: Adjacent keys on wheel - smooth harmonic transition
adjacent.notes: +1 for energy build, -1 for energy drop

incompatible.description: Non-compatible keys - avoid or use creative mixing
incompatible.notes: Requires skill, quick transitions, or key changes

metadata.notes: Based on the Camelot Wheel system for harmonic mixing. A = minor keys, B = major keys.
